sigmajs for R.

Get Started Shiny demo

With the rise in popularity of networks, it is important for R users to have access to a package that allows visualising the aforementioned networks in a highly configurable, interactive and dynamic manner. sigmajs is a Shiny-centric in order to best leverage the original library’s great many methods.

All graphs must be initialised with the sigmajs() function, all the functions of the :package: start with sg_ and its proxies end in _p, functions are pipe-friendly (%>%).

Install

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/sigmajs")

Examples

Most functions have corresponding demo().

library(sigmajs)

# generate data
nodes <- sg_make_nodes(25) # 20 nodes
edges <- sg_make_edges(nodes, 50) # 50 edges

# visualise
sigmajs() %>%
    sg_nodes(nodes, id, label, size, color) %>%
    sg_edges(edges, id, source, target)

Most functions have corresponding demos, execute the command in the run column to see sigmajs in action. You can also see some of these examples here.

sigmajs demos
name description run
add-node Dynamically add a node. demo(add-node, package='sigmajs')
add-edge Dynamically add an edge. demo(add-edge, package='sigmajs')
add-node-edge Dynamically add an and a node. demo(add-node-edge, package='sigmajs')
drop-node Delete a node from an existing graph. demo(drop-node, package='sigmajs')
drop-nodes Dynamically Drop nodes. NA demo(drop-nodes Dynamically Drop nodes., package='sigmajs')
drop-edges Dynamically Drop edges. NA demo(drop-edges Dynamically Drop edges., package='sigmajs')
drop-nodes-edges Dynamically drop nodes and edges. NA demo(drop-nodes-edges Dynamically drop nodes and edges., package='sigmajs')
clear-graph Clear the graph. demo(clear-graph, package='sigmajs')
add-nodes Add multiple nodes. demo(add-nodes, package='sigmajs')
add-edges Add multiple edges. demo(add-edges, package='sigmajs')
add-nodes-delay Add nodes with a delay. demo(add-nodes-delay, package='sigmajs')
add-edges-delay Add edges with a delay. demo(add-edges-delay, package='sigmajs')
add-delay Add nodes and edges with a delay. demo(add-delay, package='sigmajs')
custom-shapes Use custom shapes as nodes. demo(custom-shapes, package='sigmajs')
drag-nodes Drag nodes. demo(drag-nodes, package='sigmajs')
custom-events Capture events. demo(custom-events, package='sigmajs')
add-camera Link graphs. demo(add-camera, package='sigmajs')
